'''Molly''' is the "hot" nanny of [[Ross Geller|Ross]] and [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]]'s daughter [[Emma Geller-Greene|Emma]]. [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] attempts to go after her, until it is revealed that she is a lesbian and has a girlfriend, [[Tabitha]]. Even though she last appeared in "[[The One Where Monica Sings]]", she called Rachel in "[[The One Where Rachel's Sister Babysits]]" to say she couldn't watch Emma because she was sick with menstrual cramps.

==Appearances==
*"[[The One With Phoebe's Rats]]" (First appearance)
*"[[The One Where Monica Sings]]"
*"[[The One Where Rachel's Sister Baby-Sits]]" (Mentioned only)
